2. Season with salt and pepper to taste.
3. Mix all the ingredients until they are well combined.
4. Serve the chicken salad on lettuce leaves, topped with sliced cucumber and cherry tomatoes.

Enjoy your Classic Chicken Salad! Remember, you can always adjust the ingredients to your liking. Enjoy your cooking!

Description: National Garlic Mayo is a delicious blend of Garlic and Mayonnaise which will perfectly complement your snacks and meals. It is made from premium quality natural ingredients which makes it thick, creamy and flavorsome. Prepared with real eggs, National Garlic Mayo offers essential nutrients such as Omega 3 & 6 and Vitamin A. National products are carefully packaged under strict hygienic conditions, ensuring quality at every step of the process.
Recipe:
Here's a simple Garlic Aioli recipe using Garlic Mayo from National Foods as a base. This goes well with fries, vegetables, or as a sandwich spread.

**Garlic Aioli Recipe**

Ingredients:
1. 1 cup Garlic Mayo from National Foods
2. 1 clove garlic, minced
3. 1 lemon, juiced
4. 1 teaspoon Dijon mustard
5. Salt and pepper to taste

Steps:
1. In a bowl, combine the Garlic Mayo, minced garlic, lemon juice, and Dijon mustard.
2. Stir until all the ingredients are well combined.
3. Season with salt and pepper to taste.
4. Chill the aioli in the refrigerator for at least 30 minutes before serving to allow the flavors to meld together.

Enjoy your Garlic Aioli! Remember, you can always adjust the ingredients to your liking. If you prefer a stronger garlic flavor, you can use more garlic, and if you prefer a tangier sauce, you can add more lemon juice.

Description: National Vanilla custard powder is the perfect treat for your everyday sweet cravings with its delightful Vanilla flavor and creamy texture. National ensures you get irresistibly delicious custard in no time! Add it to tarts and trifles, donuts and pies, top with your favourite fruit, or indulge in this creamy delight all on its own.
Recipe:
Here's a simple recipe for Vanilla Custard Tart that you can try:

Ingredients:
1. 1 packet of National Foods Vanilla Custard (approximately 400g)
2. 1 ready-made tart shell (or you can make your own using 2 cups of flour, 1/2 cup of sugar, 125g of butter, and 1 egg)
3. Fresh fruits (strawberries, blueberries, or any fruit of your choice) for decoration

Steps:
1. Preheat your oven to 180 degrees Celsius (356 degrees Fahrenheit). If you're making your own tart shell, mix the flour, sugar, and butter until it forms a crumbly mixture. Add the egg and mix until it forms a dough. Press this dough into a tart tin and bake for about 15-20 minutes until lightly golden.
2. While the tart shell is baking, prepare the custard according to the instructions on the National Foods Vanilla Custard packet. Usually, this involves mixing the custard with milk or cream in a saucepan over medium heat, stirring constantly until it thickens.
3. Once the tart shell is baked, let it cool completely. Then, pour the prepared custard into the tart shell and smooth the top.
4. Chill the tart in the fridge for at least 2 hours, or until the custard has set.
5. Before serving, decorate the tart with fresh fruits. Enjoy your Vanilla Custard Tart!
Ingredients: 2. 1 ready-made tart shell or (if making your own)
3. Fresh fruits (strawberries, blueberries, or any fruit of your choice) for decoration

Description: National Mango custard powder is the perfect treat for your everyday sweet cravings with its fruity mango flavor and creamy texture. National ensures you get irresistibly delicious custard in no time! Add it to tarts and trifles, donuts and pies, top with your favourite fruit, or indulge in this creamy delight all on its own.
Recipe:
Here's a recipe for Mango Custard Parfait:

Ingredients:
1. 4 servings of Mango Custard from National Foods
2. 1 ripe mango, sliced
3. 1 cup of whipped cream (optional)
4. 1/2 cup of granola or crushed graham crackers (for crunch)

Instructions:
1. Open the Mango Custard packs and let them stand at room temperature for about 10-15 minutes to make them easier to spoon out.
2. In a glass or a parfait dish, start by adding a layer of Mango Custard.
3. Arrange some sliced mango pieces on top of the custard layer.
4. Repeat the process with another layer of Mango Custard, mango slices, and so on, until you reach the top of the glass.
5. If you'd like, top it off with a layer of whipped cream.
6. Sprinkle some granola or crushed graham crackers on top for an added crunch.
7. Chill the parfait in the refrigerator for at least 30 minutes before serving to let the layers set.

Enjoy your Mango Custard Parfait! Remember, you can always adjust the ingredients to your liking. If you prefer a stronger mango flavor, you can use more mango slices. If you want it to be less sweet, you can reduce the amount of whipped cream or use unsweetened yogurt instead.
Ingredients: 1. 4 servings of Mango Custard from National Foods
4. 1/2 cup of granola or crushed graham crackers

Description: National Strawberry custard powder is the perfect treat for your everyday sweet cravings with its fruity strawberry flavor and creamy texture. National ensures you get irresistbly delicious custard in no time! Add it to tarts and trifles, donuts and pies, top with your favourite fruit, or indulge in this creamy delight all on its own.
Recipe:
Here's a simple idea for a Strawberry Custard Parfait:

Ingredients:
1. National Foods Strawberry Custard (as per the serving size suggested on the package)
2. 200g of fresh strawberries, sliced
3. 100g of granola or crushed graham crackers
4. 200ml of whipped cream (optional)

Instructions:
1. Start by layering the ingredients in a glass or parfait dish. Begin with a layer of granola or crushed graham crackers, followed by a layer of Strawberry Custard, and then a layer of sliced strawberries. Repeat this layering process until you reach the top of the dish.
2. If you'd like, you can top off the parfait with a dollop of whipped cream and a few extra strawberry slices for garnish.
3. Chill the parfait in the refrigerator for at least 30 minutes before serving to let the layers set.

Enjoy your Strawberry Custard Parfait! Remember, you can always adjust the ingredients to suit your taste preferences.
Ingredients: 3. 100g of granola or crushed graham crackers

Recipe:
Title: Banana Jelly Ice Cream Sundae

Ingredients:
1. 1 cup (250g) National Foods Banana Jelly
2. 2 ripe bananas
3. 1 cup (240ml) heavy cream
4. 1 cup (240ml) whole milk
5. 1/2 cup (100g) granulated sugar
6. 1 tsp vanilla extract
7. 1/2 cup (60g) chopped nuts (optional, like almonds or walnuts)
8. 1/2 cup (100g) sweetened shredded coconut (optional)
9. 1 cup (240ml) chocolate sauce (homemade or store-bought)
10. Whipped cream for topping (homemade or store-bought)
11. Maraschino cherries (optional)

Instructions:
1. To make the banana jelly ice cream, first, melt the banana jelly in a microwave or over low heat on the stove until smooth. Set aside to cool.
2. In a blender, combine ripe bananas, heavy cream, whole milk, sugar, and vanilla extract. Blend until smooth.
3. Transfer the banana mixture into a large mixing bowl. Stir in the cooled banana jelly.
4. Churn the mixture in an ice cream maker according to the manufacturer's instructions.
5. Once the ice cream is churned, transfer it to an airtight container. Fold in chopped nuts and shredded coconut if desired.
6. Freeze the banana jelly ice cream for at least 2-4 hours or until it's firm.
7. To serve, scoop the banana jelly ice cream into bowls or cones. Drizzle with chocolate sauce, add whipped cream, and top with maraschino cherries if desired. Enjoy!
Ingredients: 7. Optional: 1/2 cup (60g) chopped nuts (like almonds or walnuts)
10. Whipped cream for topping (homemade or store-bought)

Recipe:
Here's a simple recipe for Mango Jelly Fruit Salad that you can prepare using National Foods Mango Jelly.

Ingredients:
1. 200g National Foods Mango Jelly
2. 1 large ripe mango, peeled and sliced
3. 1 cup of pineapple chunks
4. 1 cup of grape halves
5. 1 cup of sliced strawberries
6. 1 cup of coconut flakes
7. 2 tablespoons of fresh lime juice

Steps:
1. Follow the instructions on the Mango Jelly packet to prepare the jelly. Once it's set, you can slice it into cubes.
2. In a large bowl, combine the sliced mango, pineapple chunks, grape halves, and sliced strawberries.
3. Add the set Mango Jelly cubes to the fruit mixture.
4. Sprinkle the coconut flakes over the fruit and jelly.
5. Drizzle the fresh lime juice over the salad to add a tangy flavor and prevent the fruit from browning.
6. Mix the salad gently to ensure all the ingredients are well-combined.
7. Serve chilled and enjoy!
Ingredients: 2. 1 large ripe mango, peeled and sliced

Recipe:
Here's a simple recipe for Strawberry Jelly Toast with Cream Cheese that you can try using National Foods Strawberry Jelly:

Ingredients:
1. 8 slices of your favorite bread (preferably soft bread like white or whole grain)
2. 1 cup (250g) of National Foods Strawberry Jelly
3. 200g of cream cheese, softened
4. 1 tablespoon of honey (optional)
5. Fresh strawberries for garnish (optional)

Instructions:
1. Toast the bread slices until golden brown. You can do this in a toaster or on a skillet over medium heat.
2. While the bread is toasting, mix the softened cream cheese and honey in a bowl until well combined. If you prefer a tangier taste, you can skip the honey.
3. Once the bread is toasted, spread a generous layer of the cream cheese mixture on one side of each slice.
4. Warm up the strawberry jelly in a microwave-safe bowl for about 10-15 seconds, or until it becomes easier to spread.
5. Spread a layer of the warmed strawberry jelly on top of the cream cheese on half of the bread slices.
6. Place a jelly-side down slice on top of each cream cheese-topped slice. Press down gently.
7. If you like, garnish with fresh strawberry slices before serving.

Enjoy your Strawberry Jelly Toast with Cream Cheese!
Ingredients: 2. 1 cup of National Foods Strawberry Jelly

Recipe:
Here's a simple recipe for Mixed Fruit Jelly Trifle that you can make using National Foods Mixed Fruit Jelly:

Ingredients:
1. National Foods Mixed Fruit Jelly (1 kg)
2. 500 ml of boiling water
3. 250 ml of cold water
4. 2 cups of sliced mixed fruits (like strawberries, grapes, pineapple, and kiwi)
5. 2 cups of plain yogurt
6. 1 packet of vanilla pudding mix (125 g)
7. 3 cups of milk
8. 300 ml of whipping cream
9. 2 tablespoons of powdered sugar
10. 2 packets of digestive biscuits

Steps:
1. To make the jelly, empty the Mixed Fruit Jelly into a large bowl. Add the boiling water and stir until the jelly is completely dissolved. Add the cold water and stir again. Let it cool down to room temperature.
2. Once the jelly is cool, pour it into a large trifle dish or individual serving dishes. Refrigerate for at least 2 hours or until the jelly sets.
3. In a large bowl, mix the vanilla pudding mix with 3 cups of milk. Follow the instructions on the packet to cook and cool the pudding. Once cooled, spread a layer of the pudding over the set jelly.
4. In another bowl, whip the whipping cream with the powdered sugar until soft peaks form. Spread a layer of whipped cream over the pudding layer.
5. Arrange a layer of sliced mixed fruits over the whipped cream. Repeat the layers of jelly, pudding, whipped cream, and fruits until you reach the top of the dish.
6. Finish by topping with a final layer of whipped cream and some sliced fruits. Refrigerate for at least 2 hours before serving.

Enjoy your Mixed Fruit Jelly Trifle!
Ingredients: 1. National Foods Mixed Fruit Jelly (1 kg)
4. 2 cups of sliced mixed fruits (like strawberries, grapes, pineapple, and kiwi)
6. 1 packet of vanilla pudding mix (125 g)

Description: Recreate your favorite traditional dessert with National Feerni Mix. This easy to prepare mix will give you an authentic flavor, creamy thick texture and just the right amount of sweetness, making it the perfect dessert for all your special occasions. Garnish with your favorite dry fruits and nuts.
Recipe:
Here is a simple recipe for Feerni:

Ingredients:
1. 1 packet of Feerni Mix
2. 1 cup (240 ml) of cold water
3. 1 cup (240 ml) of milk
4. 1/2 cup (120 ml) of condensed milk

Instructions:
1. In a blender, combine the Feerni Mix, cold water, milk, and condensed milk.
2. Blend until smooth.
3. Pour the mixture into a glass and serve chilled.

Enjoy your Feerni! Note that you can adjust the sweetness by using less or more condensed milk according to your preference.

Description: Recreate your favorite traditional dessert with National Pistachio Kheer Mix. This easy to prepare mix will give you an authentic flavor, creamy texture and just the right amount of sweetness, making it the perfect dessert for all your special occasions.
Recipe:
Here's a simple recipe for Pistachio Kheer Mix:

Ingredients:
1. National Foods Pistachio Kheer Mix (1 packet)
2. 5 cups of full-fat milk
3. 1 cup of water
4. 1/2 cup of sugar (or to taste)
5. 1 tsp of cardamom powder
6. 10-12 sliced almonds (for garnish)
7. 10-12 sliced pistachios (for garnish)

Steps:
1. In a large pot, combine the pistachio kheer mix, milk, and water. Stir well to ensure the mix is fully dissolved.
2. Place the pot on medium heat and bring the mixture to a boil. Stir occasionally to prevent the mixture from sticking to the bottom of the pot.
3. Once the mixture starts boiling, reduce the heat to low and let it simmer. Stir occasionally for about 10-15 minutes, until the kheer thickens to your desired consistency.
4. Add the sugar and cardamom powder, stir well, and cook for another 2-3 minutes. Taste the kheer and adjust the sugar if necessary.
5. Remove the pot from heat and let the kheer cool down to room temperature. This will allow the flavors to meld together.
6. Garnish the kheer with sliced almonds and pistachios before serving.

Enjoy your homemade Pistachio Kheer! Remember, you can adjust the ingredients to suit your taste preferences.

Description: Recreate your favorite traditional dessert with National Kheer Mix. This easy to prepare mix will give you an authentic flavor, creamy texture and just the right amount of sweetness, making it the perfect dessert for all your special occasions.
Recipe:
Here's a simple recipe using Kheer Mix:

**One-Pot National Foods Kheer Recipe**

Ingredients:
1. 1 packet of National Foods Kheer Mix
2. 6 cups of full-fat milk
3. 1/2 cup of sugar (or to taste)
4. 1 teaspoon of cardamom powder
5. 10-12 almonds and pistachios, sliced (optional for garnish)
6. 2-3 strands of saffron (optional)

Steps:
1. Pour the 6 cups of full-fat milk into a large, heavy-bottomed pot.
2. Add the National Foods Kheer Mix to the milk and stir well until it dissolves completely.
3. If using saffron, soak it in a little warm milk for 10 minutes and then add it to the pot.
4. Bring the mixture to a boil over medium heat, stirring occasionally to prevent burning. Once it starts boiling, reduce the heat to low.
5. Add the sugar and cardamom powder to the pot. Stir until the sugar is completely dissolved.
6. Cook the kheer on low heat, stirring occasionally, for about 20-25 minutes or until it thickens to your desired consistency.
7. Remove the pot from the heat and let it cool slightly before serving.
8. Garnish with sliced almonds and pistachios before serving.

Enjoy your homemade Kheer made with National Foods Kheer Mix!

Here's a simple and popular recipe for Sweet Vermicelli (Seviyan):

Ingredients:
1. 200g National Foods Vermicelli
2. 2 tablespoons ghee or butter
3. 1/2 cup sugar (adjust to taste)
4. 2 cups milk
5. 2 1/4 teaspoon cardamom powder
6. 1 tablespoon almonds (sliced)
7. 1 tablespoon pistachios (sliced)
8. 1 tablespoon raisins (optional)
9. A few saffron strands (optional)

Instructions:
1. Heat ghee in a pan on medium heat.
2. Add the vermicelli and roast until golden brown, stirring constantly.
3. In a separate pan, heat the milk and bring it to a boil.
4. Once the vermicelli is roasted, slowly add the boiled milk and stir.
5. Add sugar and cardamom powder to the mixture.
6. Simmer on low heat, stirring occasionally, until the milk is absorbed and the vermicelli is soft.
7. Garnish with almonds, pistachios, raisins, and saffron.
8. Serve warm or chilled as desired.

Here's a simple and delicious recipe for Apple Jam Bread using Chunky Apple Jam from National Foods.

Ingredients:
1. 2 1/2 cups all-purpose flour
2. 1 1/2 teaspoons baking powder
3. 1 teaspoon baking soda
4. 1/2 teaspoon salt
5. 3/4 cup unsalted butter, softened
6. 1 1/2 cups granulated sugar
7. 2 large eggs
8. 1 cup buttermilk
9. 1 cup Chunky Apple Jam from National Foods
10. 1 cup chopped walnuts (optional)

Instructions:
1. Preheat your oven to 350°F (175°C) and grease a 9x5-inch loaf pan.
2. In a medium bowl, whisk together the flour, baking powder, baking soda, and salt. Set aside.
3. In a large bowl, cream together the softened butter and sugar until light and fluffy.
4. Beat in the eggs one at a time, then stir in the buttermilk.
5. Gradually add the flour mixture to the butter mixture, mixing just until combined.
6. Fold in the Chunky Apple Jam and walnuts (if using).
7. Pour the batter into the prepared loaf pan, smoothing the top with a spatula.
8. Bake for 60-70 minutes, or until a toothpick inserted into the center of the bread comes out clean.
9. Allow the bread to cool in the pan for 10 minutes, then remove it from the pan and transfer it to a wire rack to cool completely.

Enjoy your Apple Jam Bread! Remember, you can always customize this recipe by adding more apple jam or changing the mix-ins to suit your taste.
Ingredients: 9. 1 cup Chunky Apple Jam from National Foods

Recipe:
Here's a delicious Chunky Mango Jam Tart recipe that you can make using National Foods Chunky Mango Jam:

Ingredients:

1. 1 packet of ready-made shortcrust pastry
2. 1 jar (340g) of National Foods Chunky Mango Jam
3. 100g of unsalted butter, room temperature
4. 100g of caster sugar
5. 2 large eggs
6. 100g of plain flour
7. Optional: A scoop of vanilla ice cream or whipped cream for serving

Instructions:

1. Preheat your oven to 180°C (160°C fan) and line a 20cm tart tin with the ready-made shortcrust pastry. Prick the base with a fork, then bake for 15 minutes until lightly golden. Allow it to cool down.

2. In a large mixing bowl, beat the unsalted butter and caster sugar together until light and creamy. Add the eggs one at a time, mixing well after each addition. Then, fold in the plain flour.

3. Spread the Chunky Mango Jam evenly over the cooled tart base.

4. Pour the batter on top of the jam, and gently spread it out to cover the jam fully.

5. Bake in the preheated oven for 25-30 minutes, or until the top is golden brown and a skewer inserted into the middle comes out clean.

6. Allow the tart to cool in the tin before slicing and serving. You can serve it with a scoop of vanilla ice cream or whipped cream if you like!

Enjoy your Chunky Mango Jam Tart!
Ingredients: 2. 1 jar (340g) of National Foods Chunky Mango Jam
7. Optional: A scoop of vanilla ice cream or whipped cream for serving

Recipe:
Here's a simple recipe for Strawberry Jam Thumbprint Cookies using the Chunky Strawberry Jam from National Foods.

Ingredients:
1. 1 3/4 cups all-purpose flour
2. 1/2 teaspoon baking powder
3. 1/2 teaspoon salt
4. 1 cup unsalted butter, softened
5. 1 cup granulated sugar
6. 1 large egg
7. 2 teaspoons vanilla extract
8. 1 jar (approx. 340g) National Foods Chunky Strawberry Jam

Instructions:
1. Preheat your oven to 350°F (175°C). Line a baking sheet with parchment paper.
2. In a medium bowl, whisk together the flour, baking powder, and salt. Set aside.
3. In a large bowl, using an electric mixer, beat the softened butter and sugar until light and fluffy, about 2-3 minutes.
4. Beat in the egg and vanilla extract.
5. Gradually add the dry ingredients to the wet ingredients, mixing just until combined.
6. Scoop out rounded tablespoons of dough and roll into balls. Place the balls on the prepared baking sheet.
7. Using your thumb or the back of a spoon, make an indentation in the center of each ball.
8. Fill each indentation with about 1 teaspoon of the Chunky Strawberry Jam.
9. Bake for 15-18 minutes, or until the edges are lightly golden.
10. Allow the cookies to cool on the baking sheet for 5 minutes, then transfer to a wire rack to cool completely.

Enjoy your Strawberry Jam Thumbprint Cookies!
Ingredients: 8. 1 jar (approx. 340g) National Foods Chunky Strawberry Jam

Recipe:
Title: Fruit and Nut Oatmeal Bars

Ingredients:
1. 2 cups of oats
2. 1 cup of all-purpose flour
3. 1 cup of chopped nuts (almonds or walnuts work well)
4. 1/2 cup of brown sugar
5. 1/2 cup of white sugar
6. 1/2 teaspoon of salt
7. 1/2 teaspoon of baking soda
8. 125g (1/2 cup) of unsalted butter, melted
9. 1 jar (340g) of Chunky Mixed Fruit Jam from National Foods
10. 1 egg, beaten

Instructions:
1. Preheat your oven to 180 degrees Celsius (350 degrees Fahrenheit) and line a 20x30 cm baking dish with baking paper.
2. In a large bowl, combine the oats, flour, nuts, brown sugar, white sugar, salt, and baking soda.
3. Stir in the melted butter until the mixture is well coated.
4. Press half of the oat mixture into the prepared baking dish, pressing firmly to form a compact base.
5. In a separate bowl, mix the jam and beaten egg until well combined. Spread this mixture evenly over the oat base.
6. Sprinkle the remaining oat mixture over the jam layer, pressing gently to ensure it sticks to the jam.
7. Bake in the preheated oven for 25-30 minutes, or until the top is golden brown.
8. Allow the bars to cool completely in the baking dish before cutting into squares.

Enjoy your Fruit and Nut Oatmeal Bars with a generous serving of Chunky Mixed Fruit Jam from National Foods!
Ingredients: 3. 1 cup of chopped nuts (almonds or walnuts work well)
9. 1 jar (340g) of Chunky Mixed Fruit Jam from National Foods

Description: Experience the delicious taste of National Apple jam, the perfect start to your breakfast every morning! This easy to spread jam makes a wonderful spread on all kinds of breads, becomes the perfect sweet topping for pancakes, french toasts and cake and can also be used to prepare a wide variety of desserts too like pastry tarts and cheesecakes!
Recipe:
Here's a simple recipe for Apple Jam Cake using National Foods Apple Jam. This recipe serves about 10-12 people.

Ingredients:
1. 2 cups (250g) all-purpose flour
2. 1 1/2 tsp baking powder
3. 1 tsp baking soda
4. 1 tsp ground cinnamon
5. 1/2 tsp salt
6. 1 cup (226g) unsalted butter, softened
7. 1 1/2 cups (300g) granulated sugar
8. 2 large eggs
9. 2 tsp vanilla extract
10. 1 1/2 cups (375g) National Foods Apple Jam
11. 1 cup (240ml) buttermilk
12. 1 cup (120g) chopped walnuts (optional)

For the Glaze:
1. 1 cup (120g) powdered sugar
2. 2-3 tbsp apple cider vinegar
3. 1 tsp ground cinnamon

Instructions:
1. Preheat your oven to 350°F (175°C) and grease a 9-inch round cake pan.
2. In a medium bowl, whisk together the flour, baking powder, baking soda, cinnamon, and salt. Set aside.
3. In a large bowl, cream the softened butter and sugar together until light and fluffy.
4. Beat in the eggs one at a time, then stir in the vanilla extract.
5. Gradually fold in the apple jam, making sure it's well incorporated.
6. Alternately add the dry ingredients and buttermilk to the butter mixture, beginning and ending with the dry ingredients. Fold in the chopped walnuts if using.
7. Pour the batter into the prepared cake pan and smooth the top.
8. Bake for 60-70 minutes, or until a toothpick inserted into the center of the cake comes out clean.
9. Allow the cake to cool in the pan for 10 minutes, then transfer it to a wire rack to cool completely.

For the glaze:
1. In a small bowl, mix together the powdered sugar, apple cider vinegar, and ground cinnamon until smooth. The glaze should be thin enough to drizzle.
2. Once the cake is completely cooled, drizzle the glaze over the top.

Enjoy your Apple Jam Cake!

Description: Experience the delicious taste of National Mixed fruit jam, the perfect start to your breakfast every morning! This easy to spread jam makes a wonderful spread on all kinds of breads, becomes the perfect sweet topping for pancakes, french toasts and cake and can also be used to prepare a wide variety of desserts too like pastry tarts and cheesecakes!
Recipe:
One recipe you can make using National Foods Mixed Fruit Jam is a simple and delicious Mixed Fruit Toast. Here's the recipe:

Ingredients:
1. 8 slices of bread (preferably sliced bread like white or whole grain)
2. 2-3 tablespoons of National Foods Mixed Fruit Jam
3. 50g of unsalted butter, softened
4. Optional toppings: Fresh fruits like bananas, strawberries, or blueberries, crushed nuts, or a drizzle of honey or maple syrup

Instructions:
1. Toast the bread slices to your preferred level of crispiness.
2. While the bread is toasting, soften the unsalted butter.
3. Once the bread is toasted, spread a thin layer of softened butter on one side of each slice.
4. Spread a generous amount of National Foods Mixed Fruit Jam on the buttered side of half of the slices.
5. Place the other half of the slices, buttered side down, on top of the jam-covered slices to make sandwiches.
6. If desired, add fresh fruits, crushed nuts, or a drizzle of honey or maple syrup on top of the sandwiches before serving.
7. Cut the sandwiches in half diagonally and serve immediately.

Enjoy your Mixed Fruit Toast! Remember, you can always adjust the amount of jam or butter to your liking.
Ingredients: 2. 2-3 tablespoons of National Foods Mixed Fruit Jam
4. Fresh fruits (like bananas, strawberries, or blueberries) (optional)
6. Honey or maple syrup (for drizzling, optional)

Description: Experience the delicious taste of National Mango jam, the perfect start to your breakfast every morning! This easy to spread jam makes a wonderful spread on all kinds of breads, becomes the perfect sweet topping for pancakes, french toasts and cake and can also be used to prepare a wide variety of desserts too like pastry tarts and cheesecakes!
Recipe:
Here's a simple and delicious recipe for Mango Jam Sandwich using National Foods Mango Jam:

Ingredients:
1. 4 slices of bread (preferably soft bread like white or whole grain)
2. 2-3 tablespoons of National Foods Mango Jam
3. 1 ripe banana, sliced
4. 1/2 cup of fresh cream (optional)
5. A handful of fresh mint leaves

Instructions:
1. Spread 1 to 1.5 tablespoons of Mango Jam evenly on two slices of bread.
2. Arrange the sliced bananas on top of the Mango Jam.
3. If you like, you can spread a thin layer of fresh cream on the other two slices of bread.
4. Place the cream-covered slices on top of the banana slices, so that the cream is facing outwards.
5. Press gently to ensure all layers stick together.
6. Cut the sandwich into halves or quarters, depending on your preference.
7. Garnish the sandwiches with fresh mint leaves.
8. Serve immediately and enjoy your Mango Jam Banana Sandwich!
Ingredients: 2. 2-3 tablespoons of National Foods Mango Jam
5. A handful of fresh mint leaves

Description: Experience the delicious taste of National Mango jam, the perfect start to your breakfast every morning This easy to spread jam makes a wonderful spread on all kinds of breads, adds a perfect flavour to your yoghurt and can be used to prepare a wide variety of desserts too.
Recipe:
Here's a simple recipe for Mango Jam Tart using National Foods Mango Jam:

Ingredients:
1. 220g (8 oz) pack of all-purpose flour
2. 115g (4 oz) unsalted butter, cold and diced
3. 2 tbsp caster sugar
4. 1 large egg yolk
5. 2 tbsp cold water
6. 350g (12 oz) National Foods Mango Jam
7. 1 tbsp lemon juice
8. 1 tbsp chopped pistachios (optional)

For the tart crust:
1. In a large bowl, mix the flour and caster sugar. Add the cold, diced butter and rub it into the flour mixture until it resembles breadcrumbs.
2. In a small bowl, beat the egg yolk and water together. Add this to the flour mixture and mix until the dough comes together.
3. Press the dough into a 20cm (8 in) tart tin, making sure to push it up the sides. Prick the base with a fork and chill in the fridge for 30 minutes.
4. Preheat your oven to 180°C (350°F) and bake the tart crust for 20-25 minutes, or until it's golden brown. Set aside to cool.

For the filling:
1. In a saucepan, heat the Mango Jam over medium heat. Stir in the lemon juice.
2. Cook for 5 minutes, stirring occasionally, until the jam thickens slightly.
3. Spread the jam evenly over the cooled tart crust.
4. Sprinkle the chopped pistachios over the jam (if using).

Your Mango Jam Tart is now ready to enjoy! It's best served at room temperature, but it can also be chilled and served cold. Enjoy!
Ingredients: 2. 115g (4 oz) unsalted butter, cold and diced

Description: Experience the delicious taste of National Apple jam, the perfect start to your breakfast every morning This easy to spread jam makes a wonderful spread on all kinds of breads, becomes the perfect sweet topping for pancakes, french toasts and cake and can also be used to prepare a wide variety of desserts too like pastry tarts and cheesecakes.
Recipe:
Here's a simple recipe for Apple Jam Tart using the Apple Jam from National Foods:

Ingredients:
1. 1 packet of ready-made shortcrust pastry (or make your own if you prefer)
2. 1 jar (approximately 400g) of National Foods Apple Jam
3. 2 tablespoons of lemon juice
4. 1 egg, beaten
5. Optional: A sprinkle of sugar for decoration

Steps:
1. Preheat your oven to 180°C (350°F) and grease a 20cm (8 inch) tart tin.
2. Roll out the shortcrust pastry on a floured surface and gently press it into the tart tin, ensuring the sides are even. Prick the base with a fork a few times and chill for 15 minutes in the refrigerator.
3. Blind bake the pastry by lining it with baking paper and adding pie weights or dried beans. Bake for 15 minutes, then remove the weights and paper and bake for another 5 minutes until golden brown. Set aside to cool.
4. While the pastry is cooling, mix the Apple Jam and lemon juice in a saucepan over medium heat. Stir continuously until the mixture is smooth and has thickened slightly. This should take about 5 minutes.
5. Once the pastry is completely cool, spread the apple jam mixture evenly over the base.
6. Brush the edges of the tart with the beaten egg, then bake in the preheated oven for 15-20 minutes, or until the edges are golden brown and the jam is bubbling.
7. Allow the tart to cool before slicing and serving. You can sprinkle a little sugar on top for extra crunch if you like.

Enjoy your Apple Jam Tart! Remember, you can always adjust the recipe to your taste, adding more lemon juice if you prefer a tangier taste or less if you prefer it sweeter.
Ingredients: 2. 1 jar (approximately 400g) of National Foods Apple Jam
5. Optional: A sprinkle of sugar for decoration

Description: Experience the delicious taste of National Mixed fruit jam, the perfect start to your breakfast every morning! This easy to spread jam makes a wonderful spread on all kinds of breads, becomes the perfect sweet topping for pancakes, french toasts and cake and can also be used to prepare a wide variety of desserts too like pastry tarts and cheesecakes!
Recipe:
Here's a simple recipe for Mixed Fruit Jam Tart using the National Foods Mixed Fruit Jam.

**Ingredients:**

1. 1 pack of National Foods Mixed Fruit Jam (approximately 340g)
2. 2 cups of all-purpose flour
3. 1 cup of unsalted butter, cold and diced
4. 1/2 cup of icing sugar
5. 1 egg yolk
6. 2 tablespoons of cold water
7. A pinch of salt

**Instructions:**

1. Preheat your oven to 180 degrees Celsius (356 degrees Fahrenheit).
2. In a large bowl, combine the flour, salt, and icing sugar. Add the cold, diced butter, and using your fingertips, rub the butter into the flour mixture until the mixture resembles fine breadcrumbs.
3. Add the egg yolk and cold water, and mix until the dough comes together. If the dough is too dry, add a little more water.
4. Press two-thirds of the dough into a tart tin, making sure to press it evenly and firmly against the base and sides. Prick the base with a fork a few times to prevent it from puffing up during baking.
5. Bake the tart base in the preheated oven for 15-20 minutes, or until it's lightly golden.
6. Allow the tart base to cool slightly, then spread an even layer of the National Foods Mixed Fruit Jam over the base.
7. Roll out the remaining dough and cut out shapes to decorate the tart. You could use star shapes, hearts, or any other shape you like.
8. Place the decorated dough shapes on top of the jam, then return the tart to the oven and bake for another 10-15 minutes, or until the tart is golden all over.
9. Allow the tart to cool completely before slicing and serving. Enjoy your Mixed Fruit Jam Tart!
Ingredients: 3. 1 cup of unsalted butter, cold and diced

Description: National Spicy Coriander Chutney brings the flavor of the fresh coriander with a touch of spice and give your food a unique twist.
Recipe:
Here's a simple recipe for a Coriander Chutney Pasta that uses Coriander Chutney from National Foods as one of its key ingredients:

Ingredients:
1. 200g Penne Pasta
2. 1 cup National Foods Coriander Chutney
3. 1 can (400g) Chickpeas, drained and rinsed
4. 2 medium-sized Tomatoes, diced
5. 1 small Red Onion, finely chopped
6. 1 Cucumber, diced
7. 2 cloves Garlic, minced
8. 1 tsp Cumin Seeds
9. 1 tsp Mustard Seeds
10. 1 tbsp Oil
11. Salt to taste
12. Lemon Juice (optional)
13. Fresh Coriander leaves for garnish

Steps:
1. Cook the penne pasta according to the package instructions until al dente. Drain and set aside.
2. Heat oil in a pan over medium heat. Add cumin seeds and mustard seeds. Once they start to sizzle, add the minced garlic and sauté until fragrant.
3. Add the diced tomatoes, onions, and chickpeas to the pan. Sauté until the vegetables are soft.
4. Stir in the National Foods Coriander Chutney and mix well. Season with salt to taste. If you prefer a tangier taste, you can add a squeeze of lemon juice.
5. Add the cooked pasta to the pan and mix well to ensure that the pasta is evenly coated with the chutney mixture.
6. Remove from heat and let it cool for a few minutes.
7. Garnish with fresh coriander leaves before serving.

Enjoy your Coriander Chutney Pasta!

Description: National Sweet & Sour Plum Chutney Sauce gives you a unique twist of flavors that hits the spot every time and add a touch of sweetness with a tangy kick to any snack.
Recipe:
Here's a simple and delicious recipe for Plum Chutney Chicken Curry using National Foods Plum Chutney.

Ingredients:
1. 500g Boneless Chicken Breast, cut into pieces
2. 2 Tbsp Vegetable Oil
3. 1 Large Onion, finely chopped
4. 2 Cloves Garlic, minced
5. 1 Inch Ginger, grated
6. 1 Tbsp Curry Powder
7. 1 Tsp Turmeric
8. 1 Tsp Cumin Powder
9. 1 Tsp Coriander Powder
10. 200g National Foods Plum Chutney
11. 1 Can (400g) Coconut Milk
12. Salt to taste
13. Fresh Cilantro for garnish

Instructions:
1. Heat oil in a large pan over medium heat. Add the chicken pieces and cook until browned. Remove from pan and set aside.
2. In the same pan, add onions, garlic, and ginger. Sauté until softened.
3. Add curry powder, turmeric, cumin powder, and coriander powder. Stir well to coat the onions.
4. Add the Plum Chutney and stir until well mixed.
5. Return the chicken to the pan and stir to coat it with the chutney mixture.
6. Pour in the coconut milk and stir well. Season with salt.
7. Reduce heat to low, cover the pan, and let it simmer for 20-25 minutes, or until the chicken is cooked through and the sauce has thickened.
8. Garnish with fresh cilantro before serving.

Enjoy your Plum Chutney Chicken Curry!
Ingredients: 1. 500g Boneless Chicken Breast, cut into pieces

Description: National Hot Mango Chutney Sauce is a traditional chutney made with the sweetness of mangoes and our signature spices that gives it a flavorful kick.
Recipe:
Here's a simple recipe for Mango Chutney Chicken Curry that you can make using National Foods Mango Chutney.

Ingredients:
1. 500g boneless chicken breasts, cut into bite-sized pieces
2. 2 tablespoons vegetable oil
3. 1 large onion, finely chopped
4. 2 cloves garlic, minced
5. 1 inch piece of ginger, grated
6. 1 tablespoon curry powder
7. 1 can (400g) of coconut milk
8. 1 jar (340g) of National Foods Mango Chutney
9. Salt to taste
10. Fresh coriander leaves for garnish

Instructions:
1. Heat the oil in a large pan over medium heat. Add the chicken pieces and cook until browned. Remove the chicken from the pan and set aside.
2. In the same pan, add the onion, garlic, and ginger. Sauté until the onion is translucent.
3. Add the curry powder to the pan and stir well to coat the onions. Cook for about a minute to allow the flavors to mix.
4. Add the coconut milk to the pan and stir well. Bring the mixture to a simmer.
5. Stir in the Mango Chutney and salt to taste. Let the mixture simmer for about 10 minutes.
6. Return the chicken to the pan and stir well to coat it in the sauce. Let the mixture simmer for another 10-15 minutes, or until the chicken is fully cooked and the sauce has thickened.
7. Garnish with fresh coriander leaves before serving.

Enjoy your Mango Chutney Chicken Curry!
Ingredients: 8. 1 jar (340g) of National Foods Mango Chutney

Description: National Fresh Mint Chutney gives you the refreshing taste of mint to enjoy with any boring old snack, so give your taste buds a treat with National Fresh Mint Chutney Sauce.
Recipe:
A classic mint chutney recipe that you can adjust according to the National Foods' product.

Classic Mint Chutney Recipe:

Ingredients:
1. Fresh Mint Leaves - 1 cup (adjust according to the National Foods' product)
2. Coriander Leaves - 1 cup
3. Green Chillies - 3-4 (adjust according to your spice tolerance)
4. Garlic - 2 cloves
5. Ginger - 1 inch piece
6. Lemon Juice - 2 tbsp
7. Salt - to taste
8. Sugar - 1 tbsp (optional)
9. Water - as needed
10. Cumin Seeds (roasted) - 1 tsp
11. Chopped Coconut (fresh or dried) - 2 tbsp (optional)

Instructions:
1. Wash and dry the mint and coriander leaves.
2. In a blender, add mint leaves, coriander leaves, green chilies, garlic, ginger, and lemon juice. Blend until smooth.
3. Add salt and sugar (if using), and blend again.
4. If the chutney is too thick, add water little by little to achieve your desired consistency.
5. Transfer the chutney to a bowl.
6. Add roasted cumin seeds and chopped coconut (if using), and mix well.
7. Chill the mint chutney before serving.

Enjoy your mint chutney with your favorite Indian dishes! Remember to adjust the ingredients based on the National Foods' product and your personal taste preferences.

Description: National Tangy Tamarind Chutney Sauce has the ultimate sweet, sour and tangy flavor. It’s sure to make any dish pop whether its seafood, chicken, snacks or plain french fries.
Recipe:
Here's a simple and delicious recipe for Chicken Tikka with Tamarind Chutney as a side.

Ingredients for Chicken Tikka:
1. 500g boneless chicken breast, cut into cubes
2. 2 tablespoons yogurt
3. 2 tablespoons lemon juice
4. 2 teaspoons garam masala
5. 1 teaspoon chili powder
6. 1 teaspoon cumin powder
7. 1 teaspoon coriander powder
8. Salt to taste
9. 2 tablespoons oil

Instructions for Chicken Tikka:
1. In a bowl, mix chicken cubes, yogurt, lemon juice, garam masala, chili powder, cumin powder, coriander powder, and salt. Make sure all the chicken pieces are well coated.
2. Marinate the chicken for at least 2 hours, or preferably overnight.
3. Preheat your oven to 200 degrees Celsius (around 400 degrees Fahrenheit).
4. Thread the marinated chicken cubes onto skewers and brush them with oil.
5. Bake in the preheated oven for 10-15 minutes, until the chicken is cooked through and slightly charred.

Ingredients for Tamarind Chutney:
1. 250g National Foods Tamarind Chutney
2. 1 tablespoon chopped fresh coriander (optional)

Instructions for Tamarind Chutney:
1. Warm the Tamarind Chutney in a pan over low heat.
2. Stir in chopped fresh coriander if desired.

Serve the Chicken Tikka with a side of warm Tamarind Chutney. Enjoy your meal!

Description: National Red Chilli Sauce is the ultimate explosion of flavor that wakes up those taste buds and add some heat to boring snacks.
Recipe:
Here's a simple recipe for you:

Ingredients:
1. 500g chicken breast, sliced
2. 2 bell peppers (any color), sliced
3. 2 carrots, sliced
4. 2 cloves garlic, minced
5. 1 onion, sliced
6. 2 cups of mixed vegetables (optional)
7. 2 tablespoons of vegetable oil
8. 3-4 tablespoons of National Foods Red Chilli Sauce
9. 2 tablespoons soy sauce
10. 1 tablespoon oyster sauce (optional)
11. Sesame seeds for garnish
12. Steamed rice to serve

Instructions:
1. Heat 1 tablespoon of vegetable oil in a large skillet or wok over medium-high heat.
2. Add the sliced chicken and cook until browned and cooked through. Remove from the skillet and set aside.
3. In the same skillet, add another tablespoon of oil. Add the garlic, onion, and bell peppers. Stir-fry until the onion becomes translucent.
4. Add the carrots and mixed vegetables (if using). Stir-fry for another 3-4 minutes.
5. Return the cooked chicken to the skillet.
6. In a small bowl, combine the National Foods Red Chilli Sauce, soy sauce, and oyster sauce (if using). Pour this mixture over the chicken and vegetables in the skillet.
7. Stir everything together to ensure the sauce evenly coats the ingredients. Cook for another 2-3 minutes until the sauce has thickened slightly.
8. Sprinkle sesame seeds on top and serve with steamed rice.

Enjoy your Spicy Chicken Stir-Fry!
Ingredients: 8. 3-4 tablespoons of National Foods Red Chilli Sauce

Description: National Green Chilli Sauce is the ultimate symphony of flavors with a zesty burst of green chillies and our signature spices.
Recipe:
Here's a simple recipe for Green Chilli Pasta that you can make using National Foods Green Chilli Sauce.

Ingredients:
1. 200g spaghetti
2. 2 tablespoons olive oil
3. 1 large onion, finely chopped
4. 3 cloves garlic, minced
5. 1 can (400g) of chopped tomatoes
6. 1 jar (225g) of National Foods Green Chilli Sauce
7. Salt to taste
8. 1 can (400g) of kidney beans, drained and rinsed
9. 1 cup frozen peas
10. 100g feta cheese, crumbled
11. Fresh basil leaves for garnish

Instructions:
1. Cook the spaghetti according to the package instructions until al dente. Drain and set aside.
2. Heat the olive oil in a large pan over medium heat. Add the onion and garlic, and sauté until softened.
3. Add the chopped tomatoes and National Foods Green Chilli Sauce to the pan. Season with salt, and stir to combine. Let it simmer for about 10 minutes.
4. Stir in the kidney beans and peas, and cook for another 5 minutes.
5. Add the cooked spaghetti to the pan, and toss to coat evenly with the sauce.
6. Remove from heat, and stir in the crumbled feta cheese.
7. Serve hot, garnished with fresh basil leaves.

Enjoy your Green Chilli Pasta! Remember, you can always adjust the ingredients to suit your taste. Enjoy cooking!
Ingredients: 6. 1 jar (225g) of National Foods Green Chilli Sauce
8. 1 can (400g) of kidney beans, drained and rinsed

Description: National Khatti Meethi Imli Sauce has the ultimate sweet, sour and tangy flavor. It adds a wonderful depth of flavor to various meals and snacks such as samosas, chaats and rolls. Enhance the taste of your snacks with the help of this delicious condiment to get an authentic experience of Pakistani Cuisine.
Recipe:
Here's a simple recipe for Tamarind Chutney using National Foods Imli Sauce:

Ingredients:
1. National Foods Imli Sauce - 1 cup
2. Water - 1/2 cup
3. Chili Powder - 1/2 tsp (adjust according to your spice tolerance)
4. Salt - to taste
5. 1 tsp of roasted cumin powder (optional)
6. 1 tsp of chopped garlic (optional)

Instructions:
1. Heat the National Foods Imli Sauce in a pan over medium heat.
2. Add water and stir well to mix.
3. Add chili powder, salt, roasted cumin powder, and garlic (if using).
4. Let it simmer for a few minutes until the sauce thickens to your desired consistency.
5. Taste and adjust the seasoning if needed.
6. Allow it to cool before storing in an airtight container in the refrigerator.

This Imli Sauce can be used as a dip, a sauce for various dishes, or a flavor enhancer for meals. Enjoy your cooking!

Description: Prepared with the highest quality ingredients, National Chilli Sauce has a distinct aroma and a spicy kick, it is just what you need to enjoy the perfect authentic Chinese taste. Whether you are looking for the right ingredient to prepare a perfect authentic Chinese recipe, or want to add more flavor to your favorite meals, National Chilli Sauce is what you need to enhance the flavour and spiciness of your favourite meals.
Recipe:
Here's a simple recipe for Chilli Beef Stir-Fry using National Foods Chilli Sauce as the main seasoning.

Ingredients:
1. 500g beef stir-fry strips
2. 2 tablespoons of vegetable oil
3. 2 cloves of garlic, minced
4. 1 large onion, sliced
5. 2 bell peppers (any color), sliced
6. 2 cups of sliced carrots
7. 2 cups of sliced bok choy
8. 1 cup of sliced mushrooms
9. 1 can of drained and rinsed water chestnuts (optional)
10. 1 cup of National Foods Chilli Sauce
11. 2 tablespoons of soy sauce
12. 2 tablespoons of cornstarch mixed with 2 tablespoons of water (for thickening)
13. 2 green onions, sliced (for garnish)

Steps:
1. Heat 1 tablespoon of oil in a large skillet or wok over high heat. Add the beef and stir-fry until browned and cooked through. Remove from the skillet and set aside.
2. In the same skillet, heat the remaining 1 tablespoon of oil. Add the garlic and cook until fragrant.
3. Add the onion, bell peppers, carrots, bok choy, and mushrooms. Stir-fry for 3-4 minutes, until vegetables are tender-crisp.
4. If using water chestnuts, add them to the skillet and stir-fry for an additional minute.
5. Return the beef to the skillet and add the National Foods Chilli Sauce and soy sauce. Stir well to combine.
6. Push the mixture to one side of the skillet, and add the cornstarch and water mixture to the other side. Stir until the sauce thickens.
7. Stir the sauce into the meat and vegetable mixture until well combined.
8. Remove from heat and garnish with sliced green onions before serving.

Enjoy your Chilli Beef Stir-Fry!
Ingredients: 9. 1 can of drained and rinsed water chestnuts (optional)

Description: Prepared with the highest quality ingredients, National Soy Sauce offers the best taste for enhancing your meals. Whether you are looking for the right ingredient to prepare a perfect authentic Chinese recipe, or want to add more flavor to your favorite meals, National Soy Sauce is just what you need to enjoy the perfect authentic Chinese taste.
Recipe:
Here's a simple recipe for Stir-Fried Vegetables with Tofu and Soy Sauce:

Ingredients:
1. 200g firm tofu, drained and cut into cubes
2. 2 cups mixed vegetables (like bell peppers, snap peas, carrots, and bok choy)
3. 2 cloves garlic, minced
4. 1 inch piece of ginger, peeled and sliced
5. 2 tablespoons vegetable oil
6. 3 tablespoons National Foods Soy Sauce
7. 1 tablespoon oyster sauce (optional, for extra umami flavor)
8. 1 tablespoon sesame seeds
9. 1 green onion, sliced

Instructions:
1. Heat 1 tablespoon of oil in a large pan or wok over medium-high heat. Add the tofu and stir-fry until golden brown, about 3-4 minutes. Remove from the pan and set aside.
2. In the same pan, add another tablespoon of oil. Add the garlic and ginger and stir-fry for 30 seconds until fragrant.
3. Add the mixed vegetables and stir-fry for 2-3 minutes until they start to soften.
4. In a small bowl, mix together the National Foods Soy Sauce and oyster sauce (if using). Pour this mixture over the vegetables and stir well.
5. Add the tofu back into the pan and stir to combine with the vegetables and sauce.
6. Cook for another 2-3 minutes until the vegetables are fully cooked and the sauce has thickened slightly.
7. Remove from heat and sprinkle with sesame seeds and green onions before serving.

Enjoy your stir-fry! Remember, you can adjust the ingredients and seasonings to your taste.
Ingredients: 2. 2 cups mixed vegetables (like bell peppers, snap peas, carrots, and bok choy)

Description: National Synthetic Vinegar is the ideal companion for your favorite salads.
Recipe:
Here's a recipe for a homemade all-purpose cleaner:

Ingredients:
1. 1 part White Vinegar (from National Foods)
2. 3 parts water
3. Optional: a few drops of essential oil for scent (like lemon or tea tree)

Instructions:
1. Combine equal parts of White Vinegar and water in a spray bottle.
2. If you'd like to add a scent, add a few drops of your chosen essential oil.
3. Shake well to mix the ingredients.
4. Spray the solution onto surfaces and wipe clean with a cloth or sponge.

This mixture is great for cleaning kitchen counters, bathroom fixtures, windows, and many other surfaces in your home. It's a cost-effective and eco-friendly alternative to store-bought cleaners.
Ingredients: 3. Essential oil (optional, like lemon or tea tree)

Description: National Ginger Paste is prepared with pure and fresh ginger. It is your secret kitchen companion to help you prepare delicious meals everyday with convenience.
Recipe:
Here's a simple and delicious recipe for Ginger Chicken Stir-Fry that you can try:

Ingredients:
1. 500g boneless chicken breasts, sliced
2. 3 tablespoons National Foods Ginger Paste
3. 2 tablespoons soy sauce
4. 1 tablespoon honey
5. 2 cloves garlic, minced
6. 1 large bell pepper, sliced
7. 1 medium onion, sliced
8. 2 cups mixed vegetables (such as carrots, snap peas, and snow peas)
9. 2 tablespoons vegetable oil
10. Salt to taste
11. 2 green onions, sliced (for garnish)

Instructions:
1. In a bowl, mix National Foods Ginger Paste, soy sauce, honey, and minced garlic. Add sliced chicken and let it marinate for at least 30 minutes.
2. Heat vegetable oil in a large skillet or wok over medium-high heat. Add the marinated chicken and cook until browned and cooked through. Remove the chicken from the skillet and set aside.
3. In the same skillet, add bell pepper, onion, and mixed vegetables. Stir-fry for 3-4 minutes until vegetables are tender-crisp.
4. Return the cooked chicken to the skillet and stir to combine with the vegetables. Season with salt to taste.
5. Serve the Ginger Chicken Stir-Fry over steamed rice or noodles, garnished with sliced green onions.

Enjoy your meal! Remember, you can always adjust the ingredients to suit your taste.
Ingredients: 8. 2 cups mixed vegetables (such as carrots, snap peas, and snow peas)

Description: National Ginger & Garlic Paste is prepared with pure and fresh ginger & garlic. It is your secret kitchen companion to help you prepare delicious meals everyday with convenience.
Recipe:
Here's a simple and delicious recipe for Ginger Garlic Chicken Stir-Fry using National Foods Ginger Garlic Paste.

Ingredients:
1. 500g boneless and skinless chicken breasts, cut into bite-sized pieces
2. 3 tablespoons of National Foods Ginger Garlic Paste
3. 2 tablespoons of soy sauce
4. 1 tablespoon of oyster sauce (optional)
5. 2 tablespoons of vegetable oil
6. 2 cloves of garlic, minced
7. 1 inch of fresh ginger, grated
8. 1 large bell pepper, sliced
9. 1 medium onion, sliced
10. 2 cups of mixed vegetables (like carrots, snap peas, and baby corn)
11. Salt to taste
12. 2 green chilies (optional)
13. 2 tablespoons of cornstarch mixed with 2 tablespoons of water (for the slurry)
14. 2 green onions, chopped for garnish

Instructions:
1. In a bowl, mix the National Foods Ginger Garlic Paste, soy sauce, and oyster sauce (if using). Add the chicken pieces and make sure they are well coated. Let it marinate for at least 30 minutes.
2. Heat 1 tablespoon of oil in a large pan or wok over medium heat. Add the marinated chicken and cook until it's no longer pink in the middle. Remove the chicken from the pan and set it aside.
3. In the same pan, add another tablespoon of oil. Add the minced garlic and grated ginger, stir-fry for about 30 seconds until fragrant.
4. Add the sliced bell pepper, onion, and mixed vegetables. Stir-fry for 3-4 minutes until they are slightly tender.
5. If you like it spicy, add the green chilies at this stage.
6. Add the chicken back into the pan and stir everything together.
7. Pour the cornstarch slurry over the stir-fry. Stir continuously for a minute until the sauce thickens.
8. Season with salt to taste.
9. Garnish with chopped green onions before serving.

Enjoy your Ginger Garlic Chicken Stir-Fry! Remember, you can always adjust the ingredients to your liking.
Ingredients: 1. 500g boneless and skinless chicken breasts, cut into bite-sized pieces
2. 3 tablespoons of National Foods Ginger Garlic Paste
10. 2 cups of mixed vegetables (like carrots, snap peas, and baby corn)

Description: National Garlic Paste is prepared with pure and fresh garlic. It is your secret kitchen companion to help you prepare delicious meals everyday with convenience.
Recipe:
Here's a step-by-step guide for garlic and herb chicken:

Ingredients:
1. 500g chicken breasts, cut into bite-sized pieces
2. 3 tablespoons National Foods Garlic Paste
3. 2 tablespoons olive oil
4. 1 tablespoon dried basil
5. 1 tablespoon dried oregano
6. Salt to taste
7. Black pepper to taste
8. 2 tablespoons lemon juice
9. 2 tablespoons chopped fresh parsley (optional)

Instructions:
1. In a bowl, mix the garlic paste, olive oil, basil, oregano, salt, and pepper. Make sure the chicken pieces are well coated with this marinade.
2. Let the chicken marinate for at least 30 minutes, or preferably overnight in the refrigerator.
3. Heat a pan over medium-high heat. Add the marinated chicken pieces and cook until they are fully cooked, about 7-8 minutes. Stir occasionally to ensure even cooking.
4. Once the chicken is cooked, add the lemon juice and stir. Let it cook for another 1-2 minutes.
5. Garnish with fresh parsley before serving.

Enjoy your Garlic and Herb Chicken! Remember, you can always adjust the ingredients to your taste.

Description: National Foods offers a range of savory snack mixes and seasonings; which are a combination of spices used in the preparation of traditional snack dishes.
Recipe:
Here's a simple recipe for Aloo Tikki, a popular Indian snack that you can make using Chat Masala from National Foods.

Ingredients:
1. 500 grams boiled potatoes
2. 2 green chilies, finely chopped
3. 1 small onion, finely chopped
4. 2 cloves garlic, finely chopped
5. 1 inch ginger, finely chopped
6. 1 teaspoon coriander powder
7. 1 teaspoon cumin powder
8. 2 tablespoons Chat Masala (National Foods)
9. 2 tablespoons chopped fresh coriander leaves
10. 2 tablespoons semolina (sooji)
11. Salt to taste
12. Oil for frying

Instructions:
1. Mash the boiled potatoes until they are smooth.
2. Add finely chopped green chilies, onion, garlic, and ginger to the mashed potatoes.
3. Add coriander powder, cumin powder, Chat Masala, chopped fresh coriander leaves, and salt to taste. Mix well.
4. Add semolina to the mixture and mix until it binds well. If the mixture is too soft, you can add a little more semolina.
5. Make small patties out of the mixture and press them gently to make them flat.
6. Heat oil in a deep frying pan. Once the oil is hot, carefully slide in the aloo tikki patties. Fry them on both sides until they are golden brown.
7. Drain the fried aloo tikki on a paper towel to remove excess oil.
8. Serve hot with green chutney or ketchup.

Enjoy your Aloo Tikki made with National Foods Chat Masala!
